query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStocks) as total_tw_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStocks WHERE isActive = 1) as active_tw_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM twStockPrices) as tw_stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStockPrices) as total_price_records,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM twStockPrices) as latest_price_date
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3tyUrnEAZmgrWaW.7957998e07fb --database KzRzifpe7R9Hr8c3sVfR6n --execute 
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStocks) as total_tw_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStocks WHERE isActive = 1) as active_tw_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM twStockPrices) as tw_stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStockPrices) as total_price_records,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM twStockPrices) as latest_price_date
